## Authentication
### Login
--- Request
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/auth \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'X-Auth-Password: 12345' \
  -H 'X-Auth-Username: kong'
```
--- Example Response
```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..pBSuvPPgczdGOv30NDYb18OAaQvULaDSyKg_QC2Yp-oMajCgPcWFQlZA8tv68PCwIPdkd9OwbBkBA3j-h-Rq2w
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Date: Fri, 20 Mar 2020 12:43:41 GMT
content-length: 0
```

### Permission
--- Get list of permissions by pages
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/permissions/page/1/limit/3 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..pBSuvPPgczdGOv30NDYb18OAaQvULaDSyKg_QC2Yp-oMajCgPcWFQlZA8tv68PCwIPdkd9OwbBkBA3j-h-Rq2w' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Get permission by id
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/permissions/3 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..pBSuvPPgczdGOv30NDYb18OAaQvULaDSyKg_QC2Yp-oMajCgPcWFQlZA8tv68PCwIPdkd9OwbBkBA3j-h-Rq2w' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Create new permission
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/permissions \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..pBSuvPPgczdGOv30NDYb18OAaQvULaDSyKg_QC2Yp-oMajCgPcWFQlZA8tv68PCwIPdkd9OwbBkBA3j-h-Rq2w' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"name": "PERM_TEST_1"
}'
```
--- Delete permission by id
```
curl -i -X DELETE \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/permissions/17 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..pBSuvPPgczdGOv30NDYb18OAaQvULaDSyKg_QC2Yp-oMajCgPcWFQlZA8tv68PCwIPdkd9OwbBkBA3j-h-Rq2w' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
 ```

### Role
--- Get list of roles by pages
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/roles/page/1/limit/1 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Get role by id
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/roles/2 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Create new role
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/roles \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"name": "Test Role"
}'
```
--- Assign permissions for role
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/roles/assign \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"roleId": 17,
	"permissions": "PERM_DELETE_NEWS9,PERM_DELETE_NEWS10,PERM_DELETE_NEWS11"
}'
```
--- Delete role by id
```
curl -i -X DELETE \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/roles/17 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```

### Credential
--- Get list of credentials by pages
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/page/1/limit/1 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Get credential by user name
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/kong \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Get user's roles
```
curl -i -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/roles/kong \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Get user's permissions
```
curl -X GET \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/permissions/kong \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
--- Create new user
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/ \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"userName": "cong",
	"password": "123456"
}'
```
--- Assign role for user
```
curl -i -X POST \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/assign \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
	"roleId": 2,
	"userName": "cong"
}'
```
--- Delete user by user name
```
curl -X DELETE \
  http://localhost:8765/auth-role/v1/credentials/19 \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..h2sTZoBbH9-xqd74peD88Wwm6OlmOgwKBk26WD715X3MTPYIeFiCZ9AYdeqS18V8MKAiI1Nh9RC2hU4fQ5K3XQ' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'
```
